name: Skate Night
description:
It's disco night at the skate rink, and you've got rad new kicks; it's time for a totally tubular night out. Get out there and try to keep up with the bodacious boys and girls - if you're lucky, you might even score a date.



This game is part of the No Moss Studios Patreon Collections. For $2, patrons get access to 2 new games a month! Follow us on our journey here:

https://www.patreon.com/NoMossStudios
Feel free to leave a comment!




Instructions
Mouse:
Left click to move forward
Right click to slow down.
Escape: To quit.
Choose between four eligible cool kids - Cowabunga!
